name: Python
description: High-level general-purpose dynamically typed programming language.

name: SQL
description: We use SQL for the Dataware House and our relational DBs.

name: Flux
description: Data scripting language designed for querying, analyzing, and acting on data, developed by InfluxData.

name: GraphQL
description: Query language for Monday.com API and other APIs.

name: Golang
description: Statically typed, compiled programming language designed by google.

name: Grafana
description: Analytics and interactive visualization web platform.

name: Google BigQuery
description: Data warehouse and data analytics platform.

name: AWS Lambda
description: Event-driven, serverless computing platform from AWS.

name: AWS RDS
description: Distributed relational database service by AWS

name: MWAA
description: Apache Airflow managed orchestration service by AWS.

name: Pulumi
description: Open source infrastructure as code tool for creating, deploying, and managing cloud infrastructure

name: Influx Cloud
description: Fast, elastic, serverless time series data platform.

name: Snowflake
description: Cloud-based data storage and analytics service.

name: TDD
description: Test-driven development: first create a failing test, then create enough code to make it pass. Finally refactor the design. Repeat until feature is complete.

name: Pair Programming
description: Two developers work together at one workstation: a driver that writes code (tactical) and a navigator that reviews the code and and thinks about improvements, design and future issues to adress (strategic).

name: Code Reviews
description: Read and comment peer's code to find mistakes, learn from each other and improve the general code quality and design.

name: RFC
description: Written "Request For Comments" documents as a decision-making tool for teams.

name: Coding Dojo
description: Meeting where a bunch of coders get together to work on a programming challenge. They are there to have fun and to engage in DeliberatePractice in order to improve their skills.

name: Kata
description: A kata is an exercise in karate where you repeat a form many, many times, making little improvements in each. We use this technique to get familiar with new tools and platforms like the Data Warehouse, e.g..

name: Github
description: Internet hosting service for software development und version control.

name: monday-dev
description: We us monday.com as a CRM and database. It has GraphQL API, is super flexible and easy to use for tech afine non programmers. Yet, from a tech perspective it is to prototypy to use in production.

name: Basecamp
description: Project management and team communication software.

name: Github Actions
description: Self service actions platform and market space for CI/CD and any type of automations around software development workflows.

name: Pycharm
description: Python IDE for professionals from JetBrains.

name: Code With Me
description: Pair programming and collaboration service from JetBrains. We stopped using it and use Tuple instead, because its for more flexible.

name: Tuple
description: Pair programming and collaboration service. Link: https://tuple.app/

name: Slack
description: Communication software: chat, videoconferencing, file sharing and collaboration.

name: Teams
description: Communication software: chat, videoconferencing, file sharing and collaboration.

name: py.test
description: Testing framework for python.

name: black
description: Python code formatter. We replaced it with ruff.

name: ruff
description: Error checking tool, formationg and linting for pyhon. All in one.

name: docker
description: test
